query.statement:
SELECT B.POSID AS PSPID, B.POSID_1 AS POSID, A.ZSITE_NM, B.ZZSHIP1, B.ZZCOMP2, B.TEMNO, B.NAMET, B.LIFNR AS ZZLIFNR, D.NAME1, B.TEMNO2, B.NAMET2, E.VKBUR, E.VKGRP, (SELECT X.BEZEI FROM SAPHEE.TVKBT AS X WHERE X.MANDT = E.MANDT AND X.SPRAS = '3' AND X.VKBUR = E.VKBUR) AS VKBURNM, A.ZMAN_NM, A.ZMAN, B.TXT04, B.TXT30, B.ZTEAM, '1' AS TYPE1,
(SELECT VALUE(SUM(X.HWBAS),0) FROM SAPHEE.ZSDT0029 AS X WHERE X.MANDT = A.MANDT AND X.BUKRS = '1000' AND X.KIDNO = A.POSID AND X.ZCANDT < '19990101' AND NOT EXISTS(SELECT * FROM SAPHEE.BKPF AS X2 WHERE X2.MANDT = X.MANDT AND X2.BELNR = X.AUGBL AND X2.BUKRS = '1000' AND X2.STBLG <> '' ) ) AS DMBT3,
( SELECT VALUE(SUM(X2.FAKWR),0) FROM SAPHEE.VBKD AS X INNER JOIN SAPHEE.FPLT AS X2 ON X.MANDT = X2.MANDT AND X.FPLNR = X2.FPLNR INNER JOIN SAPHEE.VBAK AS X3 ON X.MANDT = X3.MANDT AND X.VBELN = X3.VBELN WHERE X.MANDT = A.MANDT AND X3.ZZPJT_ID = A.POSID AND (X.POSNR = '' OR X.POSNR = '000000') AND X2.ZTERM LIKE 'A%') AS FAKWR,
--(SELECT CASE WHEN COUNT(*) > 0 THEN 1.1 ELSE 1 END --FROM SAPHEE.KONV AS X --WHERE X.MANDT = A.MANDT --AND X.KNUMV = (SELECT X2.KNUMV FROM SAPHEE.VBAK AS X2 --WHERE X2.MANDT = X.MANDT --AND X2.ZZPJT_ID = A.POSID) --AND X.KBETR <> 0 --AND KSCHL = 'MWST') AS RATE, --1.0 AS RATE,
B.ZZACTSS, E.WAERK AS WAERS, A.KUNNR_NM AS KUNNRT, A.KUNNR, B.POSID_OLD AS ZZHOGIT, 0 AS SEQNO, '' AS GJAHR, '00000000' AS APPLD, '' AS APPLI, '00000000' AS APPRS, '' AS APPRL, '00000000' AS APPLS, '' AS APPLL, '' AS STATE, '' AS OPEYNA, '' OPEYNA2, '' AS OPEYN, '' AS OPELI, '00000000' AS OPELS, '' AS CHK, A.ZQNTY AS TCONT, '½ÅÃ»Àü' AS TXT01, (SELECT VALUE(X.REQ_DATE,'00000000')AS REQ_DATE FROM SAPHEE.ZPST0036 AS X WHERE X.MANDT = C.MANDT AND X.PSPID = C.PSPID AND X.POSID = C.POSID ORDER BY X.CHASU DESC FETCH FIRST 1 ROWS ONLY) AS REQ_DATE
FROM SAPHEE.ZMASTER01 AS A INNER JOIN SAPHEE.ZMASTER02 AS B ON A.MANDT = B.MANDT AND A.POSID = B.POSID LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZPST0023 AS C ON B.MANDT = C.MANDT AND B.POSID = C.PSPID AND B.POSID_1 = C.POSID AND C.ZTYPE = '1' AND C.STATE NOT IN ('1','2','3','8') LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.LFA1 AS D ON B.MANDT = D.MANDT AND B.LIFNR = D.LIFNR LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.VBAK AS E ON A.MANDT = E.MANDT AND A.POSID = E.ZZPJT_ID
WHERE A.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND A.PRART IN ('01', '02', '11') --AND B.ZZACTSS = #ZZACTSS# AND B.ZZSHIP1 BETWEEN #DATEF# AND #DATET# AND B.ZZCHAKG <> 'X' AND B.ZZJUNGO <> 'X' AND B.ZZGUBUN IN ('10', '11', '12', '20')
AND B.ZZACTSS = #ZZACTSS#
AND B.LIFNR = #ZZLIFNR#
AND A.POSID = #PSPID#
AND B.TEMNO = #COMBO2#
AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM SAPHEE.ZPST0023 AS X WHERE X.MANDT = B.MANDT AND X.PSPID = B.POSID AND X.POSID = B.POSID_1 AND X.ZTYPE = '1' AND X.STATE IN ('1','2','3','8') )
